fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces

Interface CyPhyIntercessionCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.interfaces.IntercessionCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CyPhyReflectionCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CyPhyReflectionConnector, CyPhyReflectionInboundPort, CyPhyReflectionOutboundPort

    public interface CyPhyIntercessionCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.interfaces.IntercessionCI
    The class CyPhyIntercessionCI defines the intercession services offered by cyber-physical components in the BCM4Java-CyPhy.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-11-21

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
